Now you have to teach them. I can give you the ideas how they'll be happy. The rascals, they do not know why, what is your specialness, and just to teach you this. My only ambition is that you are... Because the Britishers, they kept Indian culture suppressed so long because... [break] ...thekṣatriya, kings, in special cases. Not for public. Among thekṣatriyas. Answer Text: Now they are not, those Englishmen, as they were in Victorian day. Nobody cares for you.

Answer Text: London is still famous. People outside, they have got very high idea about London.

Answer Text: So write Girirāja immediately a letter, that she agreed to be president of the trust.
